cards.title: Discovery
cards.description: Tools for uncovering your game's essence.

cards.title: Strategy
cards.description: Resources for crafting your game's market strategy.

cards.title: Identity
cards.description: Guidelines and templates for visual and verbal identity.

cards.title: Activation
cards.description: Strategies tailored for your game to engage your audience.

cards.title: Adaptation
cards.description: Methods for evolving your game with player feedback.

Whether you're in the ideation phase or looking to refine your game's branding and UX, navigate through the sections as suits your current needs. Each part includes interactive templates, step-by-step guides, and examples to aid your understanding and application. For a seamless experience, follow the suggested flow or else dive into specific sections relevant to your immediate needs.
